/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, stand out against the blue sky. The trees, with their lush green leaves, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The bright sunlight illuminates the scene, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and trees.
